relation: Great for these types of students
1. Be proactive with asking for help so replies can be timely. 2. Follow up with Financial Aid consistently. 3. Stay on pace to avoid last minute technical issues.

I've been fortunate to have several instructors who have gone above and beyond with academic support. I have struggled with technical issues at times which has been stressful. I have enjoyed my studies so far here.

textAfterTable: Kasie from Apache Junction, AZ 01/11/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 62 Categories Comments Great for these types of students All types of students! Tips for prospective students Check out the site, and talk to current students, by calling the schools help lie. Bang for the buck Every buck is worth it. Am enjoying being here I LOVE IT Am learning a lot Love, Love, Love this school. I can work at my own pace. Learning new things every day, and the teachers? They are amazing, they care about if you are struggling to need an extension. Login to rate or flag the reviews Daniel from Phoenix, AZ
